meanings.sent1: The intermale friendship between the two boys was strong and supportive.

meanings.sent3: The intermale banter between the brothers always brought laughter to the household.
meanings.sent4: The intermale dynamics in the group were like a well-oiled machine, working together seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The intermale connection between the father and son was unbreakable, built on trust and love.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to interactions between males.
